description.displayText:
Gretchen took such good care of our 2 year old daughter for almost a year.  Throughout the pandemic Gretchen practiced a very high level of care, caution, and cleanliness, which gave us great peace of mind. Gretchen is always reliably punctual, and brings her pleasant and friendly attitude to work with her each day.

Most importantly, she provided tons of fun and loving care to our daughter every day. Gretchen established routines for our daughter, played with her outside regularly, read to her, and helped to potty train her.  

She is also extremely organized and keeps our daughters toys, clothes, etc. tidy and put away. 

Overall, we couldn't be happier with the care that Gretchen provided. We are moving to Connecticut and are sorry to lose her!

description.displayText: Gretchen has been such a blessing for our family! She has watched our son 2 days a week since he was 3 months old, and we couldn't have asked for a better nanny for him. Everyday when she arrives his face lights up when he sees her. She is so loving, kind, and patient. She is constantly singing to him, playing, reading, and teaching him new things. She's great about his feeding and nap schedule and provides detailed notes at the end of each day. She is so professional, always punctual, and just a joy to work with. Sadly, we're relocating to another state and will miss her very much. We've loved having her as our son's nanny and would absolutely recommend her.

description.displayText: Gretchen took care of our son for almost two years until we moved. From one and a half to over three years old. Gretchen was wonderful with him... incredibly attentive, caring, energetic and trustworthy. I always felt comfortable with my son in Gretchen's care. She helped with his picky eating and potty training, and supported us on whatever phase he was transitioning through. I highly recommend her!

description.displayText:
HARD WORKING! She really treated the kids with care! Kids love her! 
She sings to them and is very active with them!
description.originalText:
HARD WORKING! She really treated the kids with care! Kids love her! 
She sings to them and is very active with them!

description.displayText: Gretchen has worked for our family for over three years, since our son was six weeks old. I truly can not say enough good things about her as a person and as a caregiver. She is as knowledgeable about infant care as she is about engaging a toddler with tons of energy. She is patient, loving and very reliable. In three years of working in our home she was never late and never missed a scheduled day. She is a definitely someone you can count on. The family that is lucky enough to hire Gretchen will not be sorry.
